pr_title: Clarify SourceLookup sharing across fetch subphases.

timeline.bodyText:
We set the root document's _source here, but when processing inner hits we didn't use it and instead reloaded the _source. So this is safe to remove for now.
In a follow-up PR, I will fix this to make sure the _source is loaded only once for the root doc + inner hits.
timeline.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: +1, that's something that we spotted sometime ago: #32818 (comment) and maybe #56210 but never implemented.
replies.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Do we always need to create SourceLookup object here?  What about cases where we don't need _source?  May be do a object creation lazily: the 1st time it is needed?
timeline.author: mayya-sharipova

replies.bodyText: To me the optimization might not be worth it, it's not an expensive object to construct and we only create one SourceLookup per hit?
replies.author: jtibshirani

timeline.bodyText: Since this one happens at query time maybe we can keep using it? I think what you have here would cause two significant text aggs to load source twice.
timeline.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: Oops, this is a great point. I think I took the refactor too far. I plan to restore the shared SourceLookup on SearchLookup so it can be used to share cached _source in the query phase.
replies.author: jtibshirani

timeline.message: Store SourceLookup on HitContext and set the source when creating hits.
In highlighting, access source through HitContext.

Stop saving parent _source before loading inner hits.

This saved _source actually never appears to be used.

timeline.author: mayya-sharipova

replies.bodyText: I'm not sure this is the case -- looking at ScriptFieldsPhase, it overwrites hitsExecute and so processes all hits at once. That means it wouldn't be able to re-use the loaded _source (even before the refactor) ?
replies.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: Another note: I'll add some Javadoc to HitContext explaining the _source sharing strategy, since it is quite tricky to understand.
replies.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: I do think this'll break the shared loading of _source in scripts at query time though. Each script calls this method to get its own fresh LeafSearchLookup and we sort of rely on them being able to share the loaded _source.
replies.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText:
I do think this'll break the shared loading of _source in scripts at query time though.

I agree, this will be fixed when I restore the shared SourceLookup on SearchLookup.
replies.author: jtibshirani

timeline.bodyText: I think we should add a comment here about why we don't want to share the lookup in QueryShardContext.
timeline.author: nik9000

replies.bodyText: I added Javadoc on HitContext#sourceLookup and FetchPhase#prepareHitContext to explain the logic. Let me know if it could use more clarification.
replies.author: jtibshirani

timeline.bodyText: I think we still need SourceLookup here both for significant text, and for the thing we talked about where I wanted SearchLookup on FieldMapper#lookup.
timeline.author: nik9000

timeline.message: Add comments explaining source loading + sharing.
Add comments explaining source loading + sharing.

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we can still assign the context.lookup().source() with the current _source so that _script can share the source with other fetch sub-phase. That would only work for sub-phases that use a script and override hitExecute so the new FetchFieldsPhase would benefit from this hack ? We can then think how we could clenup the context for script in a follow up ?
timeline.author: jimczi

replies.bodyText: I don't think FetchFieldsPhase would benefit currently, because it doesn't support scripts? I like the plan of considering it in a follow-up, for example as part of converting ScriptFieldsPhase to use hitExecute.
replies.author: jtibshirani

replies.bodyText: Right, I was thinking preemptively of runtime scripted field but +1 to consider this in a follow up.
replies.author: jimczi

timeline.bodyText: Maybe just pass the SourceLookup directly ?
timeline.author: jimczi
jimczi

timeline.message:
Undo all changes to SearchLookup class.

They are not closely related to this PR and it's clearer to keep them separate.
Avoid passing whole HitContext to the highlight fragments builders.
Remove unnecessary method mock in AggregatorTestCase.
Undo the change to SourceLookup sharing in SIgnificantTextAggregator.
